contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox coat of arms |name = National Emblem of Oman |image = Coat of arms of Oman.svg |image_width = 250 |middle = |middle_width = |middle_caption = |lesser = |lesser_width = |lesser_caption = |armiger = [[Sultan of Oman]] |year_adopted = |crest = |torse = |shield = A [[khanjar]] [[dagger]] in a [[Scabbard|sheath]] that is superimposed upon two crossed swords |supporters = |compartment = |motto = |orders = |other_elements = |earlier_versions = |use = }} The '''national emblem of [[Oman]]''' ({{Lang-ar|'''شعار سلطنة عمان'''}}) consists of a [[khanjar]] [[dagger]] in a [[Scabbard|sheath]] that is superimposed upon two crossed swords. This is the traditional symbol of [[Oman]]. It is found on numerous flags as well as the currency of Oman and on the planes of the [[Air Force of Oman|Omani Air Force]], among other locations. {{Coats of arms of Asia}} {{DEFAULTSORT:National Emblem Of Oman}} [[Category:National symbols of Oman]] [[Category:National emblems|Oman]] {{Oman-stub}} {{Heraldry-stub}}
